title: What is Magnetotherapy and How Does it Work on the Body?
first_phrase: This text provides information on magnetotherapy, its principles, and how it can be used to treat various diseases. Starting with an explanation of the "matter of disease" and how it creates electricity in the body, the text goes on to discuss the importance of a good magnetic current and how it contributes to brain function. It also explores the importance of working on the afflicted area to rectify problems, rather than simply focusing on the brain. The text continues with information on magnetization techniques, such as passes for blood and organs. It also details how the magnetism in the body can be affected by emotional states and how to distinguish between spasms and inflammation. Overall, this text is a comprehensive guide to magnetotherapy and its applications in treating various ailments.
